√capre = sheep / goatbock 𓃶 vs 𓃙

𒃢 GÁ×PA كَبْش kabš כֶּבֶשׂ kéḇeś 𐤊𐤁𐤔 kbš “sheeps” 𒊩𒃢 female lamb #kir₁₁ #SILA4

𐘏 QIᵖ 𐀥 qiᵖ capre 𐤭 šiᵖ sheep @ Carian ☑

gender scheme:

neuter | male | female | collective / comment
----------|-------------|--------------|--------------------
𐙫 𐘇 𐘇 | 𐘂 𐀞 | 𐘠 𐀴 | 𐘡 E 𐙛 •ES 𐙛 𐘠𐘂 𐀯 sie 𐁒 goat | 𐂉 CAPER | 𐂈 she-goat | capre gamma⋍ram
𐘒 goat | 𐘔 bock | 𐘓 she-goat | capre 𐚾 𐘔𐙂 KUᵖʳ פר 𐛯 ( 𐘤 ≈ 𐙂 KU ⚠ ) 𐀥 qi/we⋍ovis|𐂇 ram/bock | 𐂆 ewe | 𐀥 qiᵖ ≈ sheep •qawe ≈ Schafe 𐘏 QIᵖ sheep |𐘑 ram/bock | 𐚽/𐘐 ewe | 𐘏 QI ⋍ 𐘕 cattle 𐘏 QIᵖ <> capre

caper capra •gabros •kaɸrāxs •hafraz •kápros κάπρος •kápras •káfrah •kapros PIE •kápros gabor gafr hæfer

𐂉 LB107M HE-GOAT CAPER

𒇻 KARPRO

𒇻 cáera caora (Irish: sheep) *kaɸerūxs capter keyrrey ikerri ჩხური čxuri შხური šxuri
𒇻 ಕುರಿ kuri கொறி koṟi గొఱ్ఱె goṛṛe خَرُوف ḵarūf > Schaf כֶּבֶשׂ Turkic *sarïk ոչխար očʿxar һарыҡ сурӑх surăh كَبْش kabš
𒇻 𒋡𒊑;𒋡𒊑𒊑 kari; qa-ri; qa-ri-ri "lamb" < capre

𒄩 ku-ú carp 𒄩 ḪA® 𒄩 ku-ú-a 𒄩 ḪA qua que the precative particle 𒀀𒀀 aᶢᵘa 𒅗𒅗 𒋛𒂵 KA.KA si-ga 𒇻𒌑 lu-ú lui

𓈋 gap ġeap ġeap geopening ⇔ capri/corn > gavrⁿ > horn 𓈋 ⇔
𓇬 𓈋 𓏌 | goats | goayr gavr caprã chèvre Schaf 𓈉 ⇔ 𓈋 gorge > каир kajir քաղ kʿał

kaparru herder chaperon Schäfer shepherd sheepherder

𒊩𒃢 kir11 capre "lamb"

vs kápros ‘boar’

Capella in Auriga, Latin for "little goat" Zicklein ≈ Ziplein !?
